text: Jagdish Mukhi (born 1 December 1942) is an Indian politician. In October 2017, he became the Governor of Assam. and a member of BJP and RSS. He also was Lieutenant Governor of the Andaman and Nicorbar Islands from 2016 to 2017. In 2019, he was the Governor of Mizoram. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Assam Category:Governors of Mizoram Category:Lieutenant governors of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands Category:Governors of Nagaland
title: Jagdish Mukhi
